contenido: Welcome to my portfolio!/separator/I'm Alexander, a programmer passionate about creating innovative and functional solutions./separator/In this portfolio, I invite you to explore my work and discover the projects I have been involved in. Each project reflects my focus on quality, creativity, and attention to detail. My goal is to create impactful and satisfying experiences for both users and clients./separator/In addition to my experience in frontend, I am also passionate about continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the field of technology. I am always eager to take on new challenges and explore new technologies to expand my knowledge and improve my skills./separator/Feel free to explore my projects and examine the approach and quality of my work. I am open to collaboration opportunities, so please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions, proposals, or just want to say hello. I am excited to showcase my work and share my passion for web programming with you./separator/ Thank you for visiting my portfolio!

Some of the projects that I have carried out, the following are the ones that I have used the most hours /separator/ 
 Online store with Django 
 /separator/ An online store made with django with its own database and functional /separator/ 
 Tower Defense 
 /separator/ A standard tower defense game made in java
You can contact me by sending an email to my email /separator/ or by filling out the following form, I will receive an email one way or another

This page has the purpose of being my portfolio to promote myself and help me find a job. 
 Everything is done with react.js, there is really only one view and depending on which option is selected in the menu/header, the 'body', which is another component, is updated and its content changes.

My work experience, although it has been little, I have a lot to talk about. /separator/ In englishexamlab I learned a lot about programming oriented to web pages, I learned about typescript, react, git and many things related to APIS, let's say that thanks to them I discovered how much I liked this environment./separator/ Much of my time in this company, I dedicated myself to parsing exercises from an old platform made in html to react with the help of MaterialUI
You can download my curriculum here
